name: J.K’S EVERYDAY (DEMO)
description:
The Land Far, Far Away is in mass hysteria. People are buying stores out of their rat proofing materials. Morale is at an all-time low. Sociability is practically nonexistent. And your rent is overdue.


J.K is a sad, sad little man who works in real estate.

His boss is a literal pig and he is the only one who can understand it. His tenant sucks, as does his life. His only friends cannot even provide console as they’re even more swamped with work than usual. 

To make matters worse, the plague is approaching J.K’s humble abode at an alarming pace.

Can he survive the rat invasion?


The DEMO of J.K’S EVERYDAY contains frequent coarse language and visual elements that may cause eye strain. Please proceed at your own discretion.

It is around 4,000 words long and should take 20 minutes to complete.

If you enjoyed what you’ve seen thus far, consider following my Twitter account to stay up-to-date!

Credits can be found here.
